CustomField.formula: IF( AND(fpro__Field_Score__c > 0, fpro__Field_Score__c <= 20), IMAGE("/img/samples/color_red.gif", "red", 25, 25), IF( AND(fpro__Field_Score__c > 20, fpro__Field_Score__c <= 50), IMAGE("/img/samples/color_yellow.gif", "Amber", 25, 25), IF(fpro__Field_Score__c > 50, IMAGE("/img/samples/color_green.gif", "Green", 25, 25), ''))) + ' ' + TEXT(fpro__Field_Score__c)
CustomField.label: Field Score (Color)
